channel.title: The Villain: A Playbook for Hearts of Wulin (Gauntlet Blog)
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog, I offer a new playbook for *Hearts of Wulin*: The Villain. You can play a rival, a fallen criminal, or someone suffering under the weight of an accusation. Of course while you can be an antagonist from time to time, when pushed you may be heroic.
Find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/the-villain-a-playbook-for-hearts-of-wulin The full blog ToC is here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog-table-of-contents.html
